name: E.R. (2017) Los Andes Kon Tiki 1973
additionalNotes:
Double Robusto
Numbered semi bo√Æte nature box of 50 cigars (1,200 produced).
A 2017 release. Released mid-2019.
This packaging for this cigar is unusual, being a semi boite nature box of 50 in four layers; three of 13 cigars and one of 11 with a double size spacer block. This style of packaging was supposedly discontinued in 1973 - hence the name of the cigar.
